Definition at line 33 of file SmootherLinear.cpp.

34 {
35 // Rising
36 if (delta >= 0.0f)
37 {
38 if (state >= target_val)
39 {
40 delta = 0.0f;
41 }
42 }
43 // Falling
44 else
45 {
46 if (state <= target_val)
47 {
48 delta = 0.0f;
49 }
50 }
51

53 return state;
